definition: lit. pick orchids and present peonies (idiom); fig. presents between lovers
to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]
allotment to a feudal noble
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)
Chinese peony/Paeonia albiflora or lactiflora
see 芍陂[Que4 pi2]
magnificent room
youthful age
to stir up trouble (idiom)/to sow discord
to exert flirtatious allure/to entice coquettishly
to explain in simple terms

ink slab and sitting mat/place where one studies and teaches
(old) graceful
to compete to produce extravagant literary works (idiom)
out of tune/marital discord, cf qin and se 琴瑟, two string instruments as symbol of marital harmony
to lose one's spouse
the joy of matrimony (polite phrase referring to a young woman)
relaxed/unhurried
broken flower, withered willow (idiom); fig. fallen woman
